author: By DAVID EGGERT Associated Press
title: AP Source: Michigan governor to issue stay-at-home order
description: LANSING, Mich. (AP) — Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer will announce a statewide stay-at-home order to curb the spread of the coronavirus, with an exemption for certain workers, a government official told The Associated Press on Monday.
content:
LANSING, Mich. (AP) Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer will announce a statewide stay-at-home order to curb the spread of the coronavirus, with an exemption for certain workers, a government official told The Associated Press on Monday.
